name: Curator-Hadoop Interface
body:
About the Project
=================

This is a tool for interfacing the [Curator](http://cogcomp.cs.illinois.edu/trac/wiki/Curator) with a [Hadoop](http://hadoop.apache.org/) cluster. To get push access, contact @s3cur3.

For insight into some preliminary design decisions, see [the high-level 
design overview](http://www.tylerayoung.com/files/High-Level_Design_Overview.pdf) and [pseudo-state diagram](http://www.tylerayoung.com/files/Parallel_Curator_Interface_Pseudo-State Diagram.pdf) PDFs.
tagline: Interfaces the Curator with Hadoop for batched parallel processing
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
